content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

A molecule of messenger RNA (mRNA) has just been synthesized in the nucleus of a human cell.
content.question: If the cell is a secretory cell, how is the protein from part (b) eventually targeted, packaged, and secreted to the exterior of the cell?

frqParts.text: If the cell is a secretory cell, how is the protein from part (b) eventually targeted, packaged, and secreted to the exterior of the cell?

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
